plugin.name: yammer-metrics
plugin.author: Jeff Ellis
plugin.title: Grails plugin to package Coda Hale's metrics jars
plugin.description:
\ This plugin provides an easy way for grails apps to create application health checks and metrics (timers, meters, counters, histograms, etc) from Coda Hale's metrics package
Pulls in the following metrics jars : * metrics-core * metrics-healthchecks * metrics-servlets (wired to the /metrics end point for the app).
See the source code documentation on Github for more details.
